thread.title: Macau casino revenue rises 5.7 pct in Feb

title: Macau casino revenue rises 5.7 pct in Feb
text: March 1, 2018 / 5:11 AM / Updated 37 minutes ago Macau casino revenue rises 5.7 pct in Feb Reuters Staff 1 Min Read HONG KONG, March 1 (REUTERS) - - Gambling revenue in the Chinese territory of Macau rose 5.7 percent in February, less than analysts had expected for the big-spending holiday period but still the 19th month of consecutive gains. Macauâ€™s Gaming Inspection and Coordination bureau on Thursday said revenue rose to 24.3 billion patacas ($3.02 billion), against analyst expectations of 7-12 percent growth. $1 = 8.0360 patacas Reporting by Farah Master Editing by Stephen Coates
